item.title: Getting started with windows-phone-8
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting windows-phone-8 set up or installed.

item.title: Storing Application Settings
item.description: Adding a value # //Add value to Isolated Storage Settings IsolatedStorageSettings.ApplicationSettings.Add("Key", "Value"); Checking if a value exists # //Check if a value exists in settings already if (IsolatedStorageSettings.ApplicationSettings.Contains("Key")) { //perform logic } Reading the value # string setting = IsolatedStorageSettings.ApplicationSettings["Key"] as string; Saving the settings # IsolatedStorageSettings.ApplicationSettings.Save();
